properties.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Kern County Desert; Lake Isabella; Tehachapi Area
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 29 at 1:48PM PST until March 1 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts to around 55 mph.

* WHERE...Lake Isabella, Tehachapi Area, Indian Wells Valley and
Kern County Desert.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds could blow down trees and power lines.
Power outages are possible. Travel could be hazardous,
especially for high profile vehicles such as campers and
tractor trailers.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads expected to be impacted by strong
winds include Highway 178 through and below Walker Pass,
Highway 58 through and below Tehachapi Pass, Highway 14 and
U.S. 395.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY
